body.p: The determination of revenue under previous insurance accounting practices varied across jurisdictions and often resulted in the presentation of revenue amounts that could not be easily compared with the information reported by other entities, either in the insurance industry or in other industries. Two common factors that resulted in this lack of comparability were:

li.p: the accounting of deposits as revenue; and
the recognition of revenue on a cash basis.
